QuestData.Title: A Monkey Idol
QuestData.Description: Before, grummles keep hozen from ravaging by bribing with food.$b$bBut now the Broketooth hozen south of here have their big magic idols. The Ook of Dook has trained them to use their idols to get power from sacrifices.$b$bThey are using them to kill grummles!$b$bYou must destroy these idols!$b$bFor every idol, there is a chief. Kill the chief and throw corpse on their altar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Corpses of Tak Tak, Dak Dak, and Ko Ko on their respective altars.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hozen are learning that it is most bad fortune to get sacrificed on one's own altar.
QuestData.RewardText: A confident hozen is a dangerous hozen.$b$bThank you for your help, friend of grummles.
